articles.title: The workers already replaced by artificial intelligence - BBC
articles.description: Some workers are already finding that they have been replaced by artificial intelligence systems.
articles.content:
Until recently Dean Meadowcroft was a copywriter in a small marketing department.
His duties included writing press releases, social media posts and other content for his company.

articles.title: What’s happening with Reddit? Website blackout continues for ‘indefinite’ amount of time - Euronews
articles.description: A two-day Reddit protest is set to continue indefinitely, with the website’s volunteer moderators saying they will maintain the social media site’s blackout unless its owners back down over new user fees.
